layer.name: Skill
layer.definition: Get measurably better at what matters.

questions.text: My skill in prayer, Scripture study, or worship compared to a year ago is ...

answers.4: noticeably better — I have methods that work
answers.5: significantly deeper — I can see growth I couldn't have imagined
answers.2: slightly better — but I'm still struggling to find what works
answers.3: improved in some areas — inconsistent in others
answers.1: the same or worse — I haven't developed

questions.text: My ability to discern God's voice from my own thoughts is ...
questions.principle: Spiritual discernment is a developable skill

answers.4: good — I can usually discern with reasonable confidence
answers.5: sharp — I've learned to recognize His voice clearly
answers.2: weak — I sometimes think I hear, but I'm usually uncertain
answers.3: developing — I get it right sometimes, wrong others
answers.1: nonexistent — I can't tell the difference

answers.4: solid — I can see patterns, apply principles, and explain to others
answers.5: deep — I can teach, connect across the whole Bible, and find fresh insight
answers.2: basic — I understand simple passages but struggle with complexity
answers.3: growing — I see some connections and can apply some principles
answers.1: surface level — I read but don't really grasp deeper meaning

questions.text: Specific spiritual practices that produce consistent results for me are ...

answers.4: established — I have a toolkit of practices that reliably produce fruit
answers.5: refined — I know exactly what works and why, and I'm still optimizing
answers.2: unclear — I'm still searching for what works
answers.1: nonexistent — nothing seems to work reliably

questions.text: My practice of seeking and applying feedback on my spiritual life is ...

answers.4: regular — I have people and practices that give me input I use
answers.5: systematic — I actively pursue feedback and adjust accordingly
answers.2: rare — I occasionally hear feedback but don't act on it
answers.3: inconsistent — I sometimes seek and apply, sometimes don't
